techmeme.title: A federal judge dismisses a lawsuit claiming Elon Musk and Tesla pumped up Dogecoin into a "pyramid scheme", finding that Musk's statements were "aspirational" (Rachel Graf/Bloomberg)
As Russia plans a trial of cross-border payments using crypto, some senior Russian leaders suggest it can help counter sanctions; experts doubt it will work (CoinDesk)
Sources: Amazon's revamped "Remarkable" Alexa, due for release in October, will be powered by Anthropic's Claude, with plans to charge users $5 to $10/month (Greg Bensinger/Reuters)
China's top antitrust regulator says it has seen "effective results" that Alibaba has ceased the monopolistic practices that prompted an investigation in 2020 (Bloomberg)
A look at Google's HeAR, a bioacoustics healthcare AI model trained on 300M sounds, including 100M coughs, to analyze users' coughs and detect tuberculosis (Saritha Rai/Bloomberg)
